00020 /**
00021  * Phidget Manager controller thread
00022  */
00023 CPhidgetManagerHandle manager_create(qport_context *qpc) {
00024 
00025         CPhidgetManagerHandle phidm;
00026 
00027         // open up the Phidget Manager
00028         CPhidgetManager_create(&phidm);
00029         CPhidgetManager_set_OnAttach_Handler(phidm, manager_gotAttach, (void *)qpc);
00030         CPhidgetManager_set_OnDetach_Handler(phidm, manager_gotDetach, (void *)qpc);
00031 
00032         doLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Opening Phidget Manager");
00033         CPhidgetManager_open(phidm);
00034 
00035         return phidm;
00036 }//[/manager_thread]
00037 
00038 
00039 /**
00040  * Pushes a message on the communication queue
00041  */
00042 void manager_push_message(PhidgetManagerMessageType type, PhidgetDevice *pd, qport_context *qpc) {
00043 
00044         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "Pushing message");
00045 
00046         PhidgetManagerMessage *msg;
00047 
00048         msg = manager_create_message(type, pd);
00049 
00050         qport_send(qpc, (void *)msg);
00051 
00052 }//[/manager_push_message]
00053 
00054 
00055 /**
00056  * Attach Event handler
00057  */
00058 int manager_gotAttach(CPhidgetHandle phid, void *qpc) {
00059         PhidgetDevice *pd;
00060 
00061         doLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Device attached [%u]", pd->serial);
00062 
00063         pd = manager_create_device(phid);
00064         manager_push_message(MESSAGE_ATTACH, pd, (qport_context *) qpc);
00065 
00066         return 0;
00067 }//[/manager_gotAttach]
00068 
00069 /**
00070  * Detach Event Handler
00071  */
00072 int manager_gotDetach(CPhidgetHandle phid, void *qpc) {
00073         PhidgetDevice *pd;
00074 
00075         doLog(LOG_INFO, "Device detached [%d]", pd->serial);
00076 
00077         pd = manager_create_device(phid);
00078         manager_push_message(MESSAGE_DETACH, pd, (qport_context *) qpc);
00079 
00080         return 0;
00081 }//[/manager_gotDetach]

00084 /**
00085  * Creates a device description object
00086  */
00087 PhidgetDevice *manager_create_device(CPhidgetHandle phid) {
00088 
00089         PhidgetDevice *pd;
00090         const char *type, *name, *label;
00091 
00092         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "Creating Device");
00093         pd = malloc(sizeof(PhidgetDevice));
00094 
00095         CPhidget_getSerialNumber(phid, &pd->serial);
00096         CPhidget_getDeviceVersion(phid, &pd->version);
00097         CPhidget_getDeviceType(phid, (const char **) &type);
00098         CPhidget_getDeviceName(phid, (const char **) &name);
00099         CPhidget_getDeviceLabel(phid, (const char **)&label);
00100 
00101         //perform copies
00102         size_t sz_char = sizeof(char);
00103 
00104         size_t sz_type  = strlen( type )  + sz_char;
00105         size_t sz_name  = strlen( name )  + sz_char;
00106         size_t sz_label = strlen( label ) + sz_char;
00107 
00108         pd->type  = malloc( sz_type  * sizeof(char) );
00109         pd->name  = malloc( sz_name  * sizeof(char) );
00110         pd->label = malloc( sz_label * sizeof(char) );
00111 
00112         strncpy( pd->type,  type,  sz_type  );
00113         strncpy( pd->name,  name,  sz_name  );
00114         strncpy( pd->label, label, sz_label );
00115 
00116         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "Finished creating Device, type[%s]", pd->type);
00117 
00118         return pd;
00119 }//[/manager_create_device]
00120 
00121 
00122 /**
00123  * Destroys a ``PhidgetDevice`` structure
00124  */
00125 void manager_destroy_device(PhidgetDevice *pd) {
00126 
00127         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "Destroying device");
00128 
00129         free( pd->type );
00130         free( pd->name );
00131         free( pd->label );
00132         free( pd );
00133 
00134         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "Finished destroying device");
00135 
00136 }//[/manager_destroy_device]
00137

00140 /**
00141  * Creates a message
00142  */
00143 PhidgetManagerMessage *manager_create_message(PhidgetManagerMessageType type, PhidgetDevice *pd) {
00144 
00145         PhidgetManagerMessage *msg;
00146 
00147         msg = malloc(sizeof( PhidgetManagerMessage ));
00148 
00149         msg->type = type;
00150         msg->pd = pd;
00151 
00152         return msg;
00153 }//[/manager_create_message]
00154 
00155 
00156 
00157 /**
00158  * Destroys a message
00159  */
00160 void manager_destroy_message(PhidgetManagerMessage *msg) {
00161 
00162         // not much to do except destroying the device
00163         manager_destroy_device( msg->pd );
00164 
00165         free(msg);
00166 
00167 }//[/manager_destroy_message]
